file_content.text: Kandhar. The Voidwolf agrees to the terms of your deal.
He will send the promised payment as soon as you secure your portion of the arrangement.
Tell him I'm close.
What arrangement? Oh, was this meant to be private?
Tell him what?
Is the White Maw answering to the Voidwolf now?
Playing with Imperials?
Don't move.
Kill this intruder!
It would be my pleasure. Get her, boys!
It would be my pleasure. Get him, boys!
Act fast. Or your men might start asking about that "promised payment."
Scared you've been found out?
What are you talking about?
Kill her, you fools!
Kill him, you fools!
Yeah, he's been busy with this deal for months. What are they paying?
How willing are you to die to protect Imperial secrets?
Boys, listen to me!
Don't listen to this spy!
He's trying to distract you. Make sure you don't ask questions.
I sure wouldn't want to risk my life defending some Imperial lackey.
The Empire makes no honest deals with pirates.
He is a traitor.
I want to hear more of this.
Why are we meeting with this Imperial scum?
You think the Voidwolf will keep a promise to some nobody pirate?
The Empire doesn't make deals.
Nobody? Nobody! When the Empire sends me their battle droids, I will lead the White Maw!
With the Gen'Dai gone and all their men sold into slavery, who'll stand in my way?
He's going to turn you all into slaves so he can take over the White Maw.
Kandhar's selling you out.
You say you're free men? Then let's take down this pawn!
Help me kill the Imperial.
No! You'll ruin everything! With the Voidwolf's help, I'll rule the White Maw, here and throughout the galaxy!
These fools are a small price to pay for the battle droids who will let me destroy the Gen'Dai.
You turncoat son of a Hutt!
Silence her! Control your men! The Voidwolf does not accept such weakness!
Silence him! Control your men! The Voidwolf makes no deals with weaklings.
I'm not working for any Imperials!
Yeah. Blast the Voidwolf. We're free men. We're the White Maw!
No, no. The pleasure's all mine.
You can try. [Attack.]
Now!
